name: SmashBalls!
description:
Welcome to SmashBalls!

I created this game within one week, and this is the first version.

The game is still in developement, I would appreciate feedback.

You can play against an AI (it's really bad, I'm working on it) or against a friend. You can even let

play an AI vs an AI (it is'nt made for this, sometimes their just standing on each other).

Controls:

-Player 1:

-Move left/right with A/D

-Smash with S

-Player 2:

-Move left/right with Leftarrow/Rightarrow

-Smash with Downarrow

In the Mainmenu, you can adjust the scale of the ground and the shrinking tempo.

Press on the ChangeMode buttons to set wether this Player should be an AI or not.
